intro: BitGo wBTC is bridged to Solana from Ethereum using Wormhole.
key_findings: There is no freeze capability on this token. Users cannot be censored.
The mint and update authority are managed by the Wormhole Mint Authority.

risk_factors: Has mint authority - tokens can be minted

authority_analyses.mint_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='BCD75RNBHrJJpW4dXVagL5mPjzRLnVZq4YirJdjEYMV7', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Mint unlimited tokens', 'Change mint authority to any address', 'Burn tokens from any account', 'Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': ['Has significant SOL balance - actively maintained']})
authority_analyses.update_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='BCD75RNBHrJJpW4dXVagL5mPjzRLnVZq4YirJdjEYMV7', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': ['Has significant SOL balance - actively maintained']})

recommendations: Consider decentralizing mint_authority - current setup is high risk
Consider decentralizing update_authority - current setup is high risk
